title: Xara 3D Maker v7
description:
With Xara 3D Maker you can create an endless variety of 3D graphics from TrueType fonts or imported 2D shapes, with simple controls to alter the extrude depth, lighting, bevel, color and texture, shadow, font size and type.And there's a whole range of animation possibilities including multi-page sequences and even animated 3D screensavers. Graphics are fully anti-aliased for the best possible on-screen quality and can be optimized for web use. Imports WMF/EMF, CorelXARA and Webster files, exports GIF, Flash, JPEG, PNG, AVI or BMP.


Xara 3D Maker is used both by professional web graphic designers and home computer users to make animated gifs, buttons, banner graphics and titles for presentations and web pages.

Here are some key features of "Xara 3D Maker (formerly Xara 3D)":

Creating and Importing:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Text headings can use any TrueType font
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Full text control, including alignment, superscript, line spacing, tracking and kerning values for individual characters or over whole selections
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Instant access to full character sets from within the text dialog
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Create non-text headings by importing 2D graphics as Windows metafiles (WMF and EMF) or CorelXARA/Webster files (XAR and WEB) and extruding the outlines
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· An automatic design-making tool instantly converts any text heading into a button, board or board with holes
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Full anti-aliasing for the best possible on-screen display quality

Editing and Applying Special Effects:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Interactive control over the 3D extrude depth - simply click and drag on the image
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Unlimited undo makes experimentation easy
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Real-time 3D positioning around three axes by simply dragging the image on screen
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Areas of text can be selected, and different attributes such as bevel, color, fonts, textures, animation and text settings applied
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· The Style Picker allows you to easily grab any or all of the settings of one image and apply them to another
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· A total of 27 different bevel types with adjustable bevel size
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Interactive, easy-to-use lighting controls (three adjustable light arrows which can be dragged on-screen)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Flexible interactive controls over the color and/or texture of every part of the image, and the background
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· A total of 37 textures are included in the download, and there are 400+ on the CD-ROM you receive when you purchase. You can also import your own GIF or PNG files
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Textures can be scaled, rotated and colored
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Images can be displayed with front and back faces, or can be made hollow
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Images can be matt or shiny
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Images can have a soft-edged shadow and an intuitive interface allows you to easily alter the shadow blur, transparency and color
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Real-time solid shading with optional error-diffusion dithering for top quality results

Animation:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Images can be animated in many different ways (see examples), such as Rotate, Fade, Pulsate, Step, Fade and Swing, using a simple interface - see screenshot
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· The Animation Picker lets you easily copy the animation settings of one image to another - see screenshot
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Apply different animations to individual characters or sections of text
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Step-through multi-page animations of different images
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· The number of frames in a sequence, the rotation direction, the speed, pause and number of loops can all be selected through simple controls
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· An animation time line allows you to step through each frame, pause and export a single frame
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Lights and text can be rotated separately
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Great for creating animated buttons

Exporting your results:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Outputs JPEG, GIF, BMP, PNG (including full PNG alpha channel), ICO (icon), CUR (cursor), animated GIF, AVI and SWF (vector and bitmap)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Any 3D animation can also be exported as a screensaver
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Optional background transparency
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Color reduction and palette-optimization for maximum quality with the smallest file size, ideal for web pages and presentations - see screenshot
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Complete control over the image size, including a handy Fit To Width feature (with pixel size shown on screen)

Requirements:

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 256Mb RAM
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 150MB of available hard-disk space


INSTRUCTION :-

1) UNRAR THE FILESWITH WINZIP OR WINRAR

2) INSTALL ZARA3D

3) AFTER COMPLETE INSTALLATION ,
COPY X3D.EXE IN TO C://PROGRAM FILES/XARA/Xara_3D_Maker_7

4) NOW IT IS ACTIVATED
